SEARCH
Package com.example.lotteryapp.reusecomponent

Class Notification

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryapp.reusecomponent.Notification
public class Notification extends Object
This class represents the notification data that populates a user's notification tab. Notifications are displayed differently by entrant/organizer/admin adapters. The class is Firebase-store able.

  • Method Details

    • constructCustomNotification

      public static Notification constructCustomNotification(String summary, String title, String senderID, Notification.SenderRole senderRole)
      Constructs a generic custom notification. Typically used by admins or organizers for notifications that are not event specific. You may edit any of Notification's public attributes even after using this method. Unless Notification.type is overwritten, this type of message does not have a button that is linked to an event. Example usage: Notification n = Notification.constructCustomNotification(...);
      Parameters:
      summary - Summary for the notice
      title - Title of the notice
      senderID - ID of the sender (current userID from SharedPreference)
      senderRole - Role of the sender (current role from SharedPreference)
      Returns:
      Notification of constructed object.

    • constructSuccessNotification

      public static Notification constructSuccessNotification(String title, String senderID, Notification.SenderRole senderRole, String eventID)
      Construct a success Notification (You've Been Invited! message) typically used by organizers to construct success Notification for winning entrants. Summary is set to "You've Been Invited!" By default, this notification has a button which links to the event specified by the eventID.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the notification
      senderID - ID of the sender (current userID from SharedPreference)
      senderRole - Role of the sender (current role from SharedPreference)
      eventID - ID of the linked event
      Returns:
      Notification of constructed object.

    • constructFailureNotification

      public static Notification constructFailureNotification(String title, String senderID, Notification.SenderRole senderRole, String eventID)
      Construct a failure Notification (You've Been Waitlisted. message) typically used by organizers to construct fail Notifications for losing entrants. Summary is set to "You've Been Waitlisted." By default, this notification has a button which links to the event specified by the eventID.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the notification
      senderID - ID of the sender (current userID from SharedPreference)
      senderRole - Role of the sender (current role from SharedPreference)
      eventID - ID of the linked event
      Returns:
      Notification of constructed object.

    • maskCorrespondence

      public void maskCorrespondence(String mask)
      This hides the sender information from the recipient with the mask provided. Typically useful for organizers hiding their ID with their name or their organizations'. If not called, the default is the senderID. Does not hide information from admins. Example usage: Notification n = Notification.constructFailure(...) n.maskCorrespondence("Cool Name") -> Entrants will see "Cool Name" as the author of the message
      Parameters:
      mask - The applied

    • sendNotification

      public String sendNotification(String receiverID)
      Commits the message to the database, which will be picked up by the user in real time. Example usage: Notification n = Notification.constructSuccessNotification(...) n.maskCorrespondence("author") n.sendNotification(ID)
      Parameters:
      receiverID - Receiver ID
      Returns:
      The ID of the notification document in Firebase for that user

    • broadcastNotification

      public void broadcastNotification(List<String> receivers)
      Commits the message to the database, which will be picked up by all users specified in real time. Example usage: Notification n = Notification.constructSuccessNotification(...) n.maskCorrespondence("author") n.broadcastNotification(List)
      Parameters:
      receivers - IDs of receivers
